TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed AxHost/ActiveXInvokeKind extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of member that referenced the ActiveX control while it was in an invalid state.

remarks.format: ## Examples The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.ActiveXInvokeKind> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.InvalidActiveXStateException> exception to specify the type of member that referenced the ActiveX control while it was an invalid state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AxHost/ActiveXInvokeKind MethodInvoke = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A method referenced the ActiveX control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AxHost/ActiveXInvokeKind PropertyGet = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The get accessor of a property referenced the ActiveX control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AxHost/ActiveXInvokeKind PropertySet = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The set accessor of a property referenced the ActiveX control.
